attributes.action: Stop making asthmatics pay for their inhalers!
attributes.additional_details: It's unfair that asthmatics have to pay for their inhalers when it is something they need to have in order to function and even stay alive! The government need to re-think this! Some people can't afford to pay the amount needed every month in order to be able to breathe!

rejection.details: Please see: The Prescription Charges Campaign
